price: O ser humano não se enfada de suplicar o bem e, se o mal o toca, fica desesperado, desalentado.
arabic: لَّا يَسۡـَٔمُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مِن دُعَآءِ ٱلۡخَيۡرِ وَإِن مَّسَّهُ ٱلشَّرُّ فَيَـُٔوسٞ قَنُوطٞ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: lā yasamu al-insānu min duʿāi al-khayri wa-in massahu al-sharu fayaūsun qanūṭun
